# MemoryShareFunction delegate

```csharp
public delegate IntPtr MemoryShareFunction(IntPtr mem, long offset, long size);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| mem | Transfer ownership: none |
| offset | Transfer ownership: none |
| size | Transfer ownership: none |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: full
